title: Ramping Up the Rollout (with Robert Halfon MP)
itunes:title: Ramping Up the Rollout (with Robert Halfon MP)
description:
Seven vaccination centres are opening up across England today to boost the government's effort to inoculate 13 million people by the middle of next month.

Robert Halfon, Conservative MP for Harlow and chair of the education select committee, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing that teachers should be pushed up the priority list.

Plus, how realistic is the government's goal? Sam Fazeli, senior pharmaceutical analyst at Bloomberg Intelligence, joins to explain.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
